text: Ernst Middendorp (born 28 October 1958) is a German association football coach who coaches South African Premier Soccer League club Maritzburg United. ==Coaching record== Team From To Record VfB Alstätte July 1985 June 1987 — Eintracht Nordhorn 1 July 1987 18 April 1988 — Arminia Bielefeld 18 April 1988 8 October 1990 — VfB Rheine November 1990 June 1992 — FC Gütersloh 1 July 1992 30 June 1994 Arminia Bielefeld 25 August 1994 16 August 1998 KFC Uerdingen 05 25 March 1999 30 June 1999 VfL Bochum 1 July 1999 25 October 1999 Asante Kotoko January 2000 June 2002 — FC Augsburg 1 July 2002 28 September 2003 Hearts of Oak March 2004 June 2004 — Tractor Sazi July 2004 June 2005 — Kaizer Chiefs 1 July 2005 4 March 2007 Arminia Bielefeld 14 March 2007 10 December 2007 Changchun Yatai 27 July 2008 31 December 2008 Rot-Weiss Essen 6 April 2009 6 May 2009 Anorthosis Famagusta 7 May 2009 24 July 2009 Maritzburg United 16 November 2009 12 March 2011 Golden Arrows 21 March 2011 30 September 2011 Maritzburg United 18 January 2012 10 October 2013 Bloemfontein Celtic 11 October 2013 14 December 2014 Chippa United 5 January 2015 30 March 2015 Free State Stars 29 August 2015 21 December 2015 Maritzburg United 28 December 2015 24 November 2016 Kaizer Chiefs 7 December 2018 9 September 2020 Saint George 23 October 2020 24 November 2020 — Maritzburg United 26 Novewmber 2020 present ==References== ==Other websites== * Ernst Middendorp | Official Site Category:German football managers Category:German footballers Category:Living people Category:1958 births Category:KFC Uerdingen 05 managers Category:Arminia Bielefeld managers Category:Rot-Weiss Essen managers
title: Ernst Middendorp
